column4: Hi everyone, I'm in my last year of school, and i'm looking for Idea's to do my endproject, I tought it would be original to do something with linux. (I have an idea: Some sort of webbased app with wich you could view your linux server cpu usage, memory usage, running services..., disconnect certain clients, ban management, and much more. My question to yo is, is this a doable project, and is it even possible?)
it's doable and has already been done
